name: The Olga Lengyel Institute for Holocaust Studies and Human Rights
goal:
The Olga Lengyel Institute (TOLI) is a New York-based public charitable institution that provides professional development to inspire and sustain educators teaching about the Holocaust, other genocides, and human rights in the United States and in Europe.

The aim of our programs is to contribute to increase the quality of education regarding the Holocaust and social justice in United States and Europe. Our programs contribute to a better understanding of the Holocaust and to the development of more positive attitudes towards minorities.
euInitiatives: Our activities in Europe involved so far working mainly with teachers. We have not yet been involved in any EU initiatives, policies or legislative files.
